info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 10:14PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL EDDY AND SOUTHWESTERN LEA COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM MDT... At 1014 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles east of Malaga, or 30 miles east of Carlsbad, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Eddy and southwestern Lea Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
